name: HMAddAccessoryRequest
desc: A request to add an accessory to a particular home.

items.name: var home: HMHome
items.desc: The home to which to add the accessory.

items.name: var accessoryCategory: HMAccessoryCategory
items.desc: The category of the accessory to add.

items.name: var accessoryName: String
items.desc: The name of the accessory to add.

items.name: var requiresSetupPayloadURL: Bool
items.desc: An indication of whether the add operation requires a setup payload URL.

items.name: func makePayload(ownershipToken: HMAccessoryOwnershipToken) -> HMAccessorySetupPayload?
items.desc: Builds an accessory setup payload with the given ownership token.

items.name: func makePayload(url: URL, ownershipToken: HMAccessoryOwnershipToken) -> HMAccessorySetupPayload?
items.desc: Builds an accessory setup payload with the given setup payload URL and ownership token.
